actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating segments of the New River as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates segments of the New River in specified regions of North Carolina, Virginia, and West Virginia as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1276(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating segments of the New River as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
